item.description: [ç½‘é¼æ¯ 2020 ç„æ­¦ç»„]SSRFMe <?php function check_inner_ip($url) { $match_result=preg_match('/^(http|https|gopher|dict)?:\/\/.*(\/)?.*$/',$url); if (!$match_result) { die('url fomat error'); } try { $url_parse=parse_url($url); } catch(Exception $e) { die('url fomat error'); return false; } $hostname=$url_parse['host']; $ip=gethostbyname($hostname); $int_ip=ip2long($ip); return ip2long('127.0.0.0')>>24 == $int_ip>>24 || ip2long('10.0.0.0')>>24 == $int_ip>>24 || ip2long('172.16.0.0')>>20 == $int_ip>>20 || ip2long('192.168.0.0')>>16 == $int_ip>>16; } function safe_request_url($url) { if (check_inner_ip($url)) { echo $url.' is inner
